short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will highlight translation key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows finding translations in angular application using ngx-translate library by providing its key as long as it's declared in static way.
Currently supported are only text translations, not translations of placeholders or tooltips.
